remarks:
Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom 20 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-ltadd .  Normally new proofs would use ~ axltadd .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) 

---

 Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-ltadd .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: ax-pre-ltadd $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A <RR B -> ( C + A ) <RR ( C + B ) ) ) $.
